item.description:
"Hacking War- hacking the war machine and ending the occupation"

Antiwar meetup. Join us in a presentation and open discussion of the war and
the underlying logic behind it. In particular, we will be hearing a report
on the current state of the war in Iraq and discussing who benefits and who
loses from the war.
We will be planning guerrilla activism tactics and actions around the city
for the next months. get active!
let's hack the war down!

Saturday, December 1st, 3:00 PM

Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Avenue, 5th Floor, Boston
(Two blocks from the Chinatown T stop on the Orange Line and four blocks
from the Boylston Street T stop on the Green Line)

Refreshments -- All Welcome -- Please get involved

ps: Hacking war is a sub group of STWC.
item.name: Hacking War
